data.name: Albinauric Ashes
data.description: Ashen remains in which spirits yet dwell. Use to summon the spirits of two Albinaurics.

data.name: Ancestral Follower Ashes
data.description: Ashen remains in which spirits yet dwell. Use to summon the spirit of an ancestral follower.

data.name: Archer Ashes
data.description: Ashen remains in which spirits yet dwell. Use to summon three archer spirits.

data.name: Avionette Soldier Ashes
data.description: Ashen remains in which spirits yet dwell. Use to summon the spirits of two avionette soldiers. Spirits of marionette soldiers with avian features that were created to serve a sorcerer. Equipped with long-hafted scythes, they also attack from the skies by lobbing fire pots. Can sometimes malfunction when damaged.
data.effect: Summon the spirits of two avionette soldiers

data.name: Banished Knight Oleg
data.description: Ashen remains in which spirits yet dwell. Use to summon the spirit of Oleg, the Banished Knight.

data.name: Demi-human Ashes
data.description: Ashen remains in which spirits yet dwell. Use to summon the spirits of five demi-humans.

data.name: Fanged Imp Ashes
data.description: Ashes remains in which spirits yet dwell. Use to summon two fanged imp spirits.

data.name: Finger Maiden Therolina Puppet
data.effect: Summons spirit of Finger Maiden Therolina

data.name: Giant Rat Ashes
data.description: Ashen remains in which spirits yet dwell. Use to summon the spirits of three giant rats.

data.name: Black Knife Tiche
data.description: Legendary ashen remains. Use to summon the spirit of Black Knife Tiche.
data.effect: Summons spirit of Black Knife Tiche
